007package renderer.models_TP;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import renderer.scene.util.MeshMaker_TP;
012import renderer.scene.util.MeshType;
013
014/**
015   Create a solid model of a right square pyramid with its
016   base in the xz-plane and its apex on the positive y-axis.
017<p>
018   See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyramid_(geometry)" target="_top">
019                https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyramid_(geometry)</a>
020
021   @see PyramidFrustum
022*/
023public class Pyramid extends Model implements MeshMaker_TP
024{
025   public final double s;
026   public final double h;
027   public final int n;
028   public final int k;
029   public final MeshType type;
030
031   /**
032      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
033      a base side length of 2, height 1, and apex on the positive y-axis.
034   */
035   public Pyramid( )
036   {
037      this(2.0, 1.0, 15, 4);
038   }
039
040
041   /**
042      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
043      a base length of {@code s}, height {@code h}, and apex on the
044      positive y-axis.
045
046      @param s  side length of the base in the xz-plane
047      @param h  height of the apex on the y-axis
048   */
049   public Pyramid(final double s, final double h)
050   {
051      super(String.format("Pyramid(%.2f,%.2f)", s, h));
052
053      this.s = s;
054      this.h = h;
055      this.n = 1;
056      this.k = 1;
057      this.type = MeshType.HORIZONTAL;
058
059      // Create the pyramid's geometry.
060      addVertex(new Vertex(-s/2, 0, -s/2),  // base
061                new Vertex(-s/2, 0,  s/2),
062                new Vertex( s/2, 0,  s/2),
063                new Vertex( s/2, 0, -s/2),
064                new Vertex(  0,  h,   0));  // apex
065
066      // Create 6 triangles.
067      // Make sure the triangles are all
068      // oriented in the same way!
069      addPrimitive(new TriangleStrip(0, 1, 3, 2),      // 2 base triangles
070                   new TriangleFan(4, 0, 1, 2, 3, 0)); // 4 sides
071   }
072
073
074   /**
075      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
076      a base length of {@code s}, height {@code h}, and apex on the
077      positive y-axis.
078
079      @param s  side length of the base in the xz-plane
080      @param h  height of the apex on the y-axis
081      @param n  number of lines of latitude around the body of the pyramid
082      @param k  number of triangles in the triangle fan at the top of each side
083      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
084      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 1
085   */
086   public Pyramid(final double s, final double h,
087                  final int n, final int k)
088   {
089      this(s, h, n, k, MeshType.HORIZONTAL);
090   }
091
092
093   /**
094      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
095      a base length of {@code s}, height {@code h}, and apex on the
096      positive y-axis.
097   <p>
098      The last parameter provides a choice between having a square
099      grid of lines or a line fan in the base of the pyramid.
100
101      @param s  side length of the base in the xz-plane
102      @param h  height of the apex on the y-axis
103      @param n  number of lines of latitude around the body of the pyramid
104      @param k  number of triangles in the triangle fan at the top of each side
105      @param type  choose between striped and checkerboard triangle strips
106      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
107      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 1
108   */
109   public Pyramid(double s, double h,
110                  final int n, final int k,
111                  final MeshType type)
112   {
113      super(String.format("Pyramid(%.2f,%.2f,%d,%d)", s, h, n, k));
114
115      if (n < 1)
116         throw new IllegalArgumentException("n must be greater than 0");
117      if (k < 1)
118         throw new IllegalArgumentException("k must be greater than 0");
119
120      this.s = s;
121      this.h = h;
122      this.n = n;
123      this.k = k;
124      this.type = type;
125
126      // Create the pyramid's geometry.
127      final double deltaH = h / n;
128
129      // An array of vertices to be used to create triangles.
130      final Vertex[][] v = new Vertex[n][4*k + 1];
131
132      // Create the vertices.
133      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // choose a height of latitude
134      {
135         final double y = i * deltaH;
136       //final double slantSide = s * (1.0 - i*(1.0 / n));
137         final double slantSide = s - i*(s / n);
138         final double deltaS = slantSide / k;
139
140         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
141         {
142            v[i][j] = new Vertex(-slantSide/2 + j*deltaS,
143                                  y,
144                                 -slantSide/2);
145         }
146         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
147         {
148            v[i][k+j] = new Vertex( slantSide/2,
149                                    y,
150                                   -slantSide/2 + j*deltaS);
151         }
152         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
153         {
154            v[i][2*k+j] = new Vertex( slantSide/2 - j*deltaS,
155                                      y,
156                                      slantSide/2);
157         }
158         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
159         {
160            v[i][3*k+j] = new Vertex(-slantSide/2,
161                                      y,
162                                      slantSide/2 - j*deltaS);
163         }
164         // create one more vertex to close the latitude
165         v[i][4*k] = new Vertex(v[i][0].x, v[i][0].y, v[i][0].z);
166      }
167
168      // Add the vertices to this model.
169      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
170      {
171         for (int j = 0; j < 4*k + 1; ++j)
172         {
173            addVertex( v[i][j] );
174         }
175      }
176      addVertex(new Vertex(0, h, 0),
177                new Vertex(0, 0, 0));
178      final int apexIndex = n * (4*k + 1),
179                bottomCenterIndex = apexIndex + 1;
180
181      // Create all the triangle strips around the pyramid wall.
182      if (MeshType.HORIZONTAL == type)
183      {
184         for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) // choose a height of latitude
185         {
186            final Primitive triStrip = new TriangleStrip();
187            for (int j = 0; j < 4*k + 1; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
188            {
189               triStrip.addIndex(   i *(4*k+1) + j );  // v[i  ][j]
190               triStrip.addIndex((1+i)*(4*k+1) + j );  // v[i+1][j]
191            }
192            addPrimitive(triStrip);
193         }
194      }
195      else if (MeshType.VERTICAL == type)
196      {
197         for (int j = 0; j < 4*k; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
198         {
199            final Primitive triStrip = new TriangleStrip();
200            triStrip.addIndex(bottomCenterIndex);
201            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // choose a height of latitude
202            {
203               triStrip.addIndex(i * (4*k+1) + j);    // v[i][j  ]
204               triStrip.addIndex(i * (4*k+1) + j+1);  // v[i][j+1]
205            }
206            triStrip.addIndex(apexIndex);
207            addPrimitive(triStrip);
208         }
209      }
210      else // MeshType.CHECKER triangle strips
211      {
212         for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) // choose a height of latitude
213         {
214            for (int j = 0; j < 4*k; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
215            {
216               addPrimitive(
217                  new TriangleStrip(  i *(4*k+1)+j,       // v[i  ][j  ]
218                                   (1+i)*(4*k+1)+j,       // v[i+1][j  ]
219                                      i *(4*k+1)+j + 1,   // v[i  ][j+1]
220                                   (1+i)*(4*k+1)+j + 1)); // v[i+1][j+1]
221            }
222         }
223      }
224
225      if ( MeshType.HORIZONTAL == type
226        || MeshType.CHECKER == type )
227      {
228         // Create the triangle fan at the apex.
229         final Primitive apexFan = new TriangleFan();
230         apexFan.addIndex(apexIndex);
231         for (int j = 4*k; j >= 0; --j) // choose a line of longitude
232         {
233            apexFan.addIndex( (n-1)*(4*k+1)+j );  // v[n-1][j]
234         }
235         addPrimitive(apexFan);
236
237         if (MeshType.CHECKER == type)
238         {
239            // Create the grid in the base of the pyramid.
240
241            // Arrays of indices to be used to create the grid.
242            final int[][] vGrid = new int[k+1][k+1];
243            int vIndex = vertexList.size();
244            // Create vertices for the bottom grid.
245            final double deltaS = s / k;
246            for (int i = 0; i < k + 1; ++i)
247            {
248               for (int j = 0; j < k + 1; ++j)
249               {
250                  addVertex(new Vertex(-s/2 + i * deltaS,
251                                        0,
252                                       -s/2 + j * deltaS));
253                  vGrid[i][j] = vIndex;
254                  vIndex += 1;
255               }
256            }
257            // Create the triangle strips in the base grid.
258            for (int i = 0; i < k; ++i)
259            {
260               for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
261               {
262                  addPrimitive(new TriangleStrip(vGrid[i  ][j  ],
263                                                 vGrid[i+1][j  ],
264                                                 vGrid[i  ][j+1],
265                                                 vGrid[i+1][j+1]));
266               }
267            }
268         }
269         else
270         {
271            // Create the triangle fan in the base.
272            final Primitive bottomFan = new TriangleFan();
273            bottomFan.addIndex(bottomCenterIndex);
274            for (int j = 0; j < 4*k + 1; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
275            {
276               bottomFan.addIndex( j );  // v[0][j]
277            }
278            addPrimitive(bottomFan);
279         }
280      }
281   }
282
283
284
285   // Implement the MeshMaker_TP interface (four methods).
286   @Override public int getHorzCount() {return n;}
287
288   @Override public int getVertCount() {return k;}
289
290   @Override public MeshType getType() {return type;}
291
292   @Override
293   public Pyramid remake(final int n, final int k, final MeshType type)
294   {
295      return new Pyramid(this.s, this.h,
296                         n, k,
297                         type);
298   }
299}//Pyramid
